name: Bastion Cruiser
description: The first cruiser class ship of Altairian Faction. It has a Firestorm Overdrive that can be activate when the shield drops.. It has also counter chain.
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprints in Altairian Vanguard Cargo in Altarian Sector
tips-builds: I recommend using Epshilon Echo Cannon, Spectral shell, Harmonic thruster or zephyr whatever you want to use .. when elited use xeno echo cannon. You can also use Harmonic beam capacitor 3 or celestial optics and regenaration converter 3 as its specials.
author: Tsun-Devil Sonanochi
